description: Wyze Labs is investigating a security issue while experiencing a service outage that has been causing connectivity issues since this morning. [...]
title: Wyze investigating 'security issue' amid ongoing outage

description: SolarWinds has patched five remote code execution (RCE) flaws in its Access Rights Manager (ARM) solution, including three critical severity vulnerabilities that allow unauthenticated exploitation. [...]
title: SolarWinds fixes critical RCE bugs in access rights audit solution

description: Security researchers analyzing the Alpha ransomware payload and modus operandi discovered overlaps with the now-defunct Netwalker ransomware operation. [...]
title: Alpha ransomware linked to NetWalker operation dismantled in 2021

description: The North Korean hacker collective Lazarus, infamous for having carried out numerous large-scale cryptocurrency heists over the years, has switched to using YoMix bitcoin mixer to launder stolen proceeds. [...]
title: North Korean hackers now launder stolen crypto via YoMix tumbler
